response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it's a game-changer in its field, valued at $1,000,000 to you. Considering its unique features and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I propose a price of $1,250,000 for this remarkable asset. This offer represents a significant value proposition, allowing you to acquire something truly exceptional without breaking the bank. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
